title: The How the Other Half Banks Edition
description:
On this episode of Slate Money, Mehrsa Baradaran, author of How the Other Half Banks,  joins Felix Salmon of Fusion, Cathy O’Neil of mathbabe.org, and Slate’s Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann, to discuss unbanking in America.
Topics discussed on today’s show include:

How banks are failing poor and working class Americans
How postal banking could be a solution
The debate over prepaid debit cards
